title: "Magnetic crawler robots to perform marine antifouling"
excerpt: "The Roverclean 3.0 magnetic crawler robots, which are guided by artificial intelligence (AI)-powered analytics, are expected to reduce hull fouling on ships, which will subsequently reduce fuel consumption, costs and, ultimately, carbon emissions."
